# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates an appearance object from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a bar button item appearance object

- **init(style:)**: Creates an appearance with default values that are appropriate for the specified button style.
- **init()**: Creates an appearance object with default values that are appropriate for a plain button.
